title: The Deer Hunter (2 disc ed) [1978] Nordic subs
description:
Please seed!

The Deer Hunter [1978] (2 disc edition)

An in-depth examination of the way that the Vietnam war affects the
lives of people in a small industrial town in the USA. 

Starring: Robert De Niro, Christopher Walken and John Cazale
Director: Michael Cimino


Video: MPEG2PAL 16:9 720x576

Audio: English Dolby AC-3/6
       Commentary English Dolby AC-3/2

Subs:  Dansk, Norsk, Suomi, Svenska


Extras: Commentary by Michael Cimino
        Disc 2: Interview
                - with director Michael Cimino
                - with John Savage
                - with director of photography, Vilmos Zsigmond
                Filmographies: Michael Cimino, Vilmos Zsigmond, Robert De Niro,
                               Christopher Walken, Meryl Streep, John Savage
                Photogallery
                Trailer

Stripped: -
